Key Match Events: Raphinha scored a penalty in the 38th minute
Raphinha scored his second goal in the 54th minute
Andreas Pereira scored a stunning third goal for Brazil on 71 minutes
Luiz Henrique scored a fourth goal for Brazil on 74 minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil move four points above the final automatic qualification position
Peru's chances of reappearing at the World Cup after missing out in 2022 now look to be their best chance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brazil have not conceded a goal in their last five games against Peru
Others: Raphinha was named the Flashscore Man of the Match
